T01D1141:102a-1: ae kotta ri ka sta ba /
T01D1141:102a-5: chos gcig la ni mngon dgyes shing //
T01D1141:102a-6: nags su gcig pur bzhugs pa dang //
T01D1141:102a-7: 'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig gyur //
T01D1141:102a-9: rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa //
T01D1141:102a-10: bden pa gnyis ni rnam par bsgoms //
T01D1141:102a-11: grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba //
T01D1141:102a-12: gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102a-13: ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang //
T01D1141:102a-14: dkon mchog gsum po cha mnyam zhing //
T01D1141:102a-15: sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal //
T01D1141:102a-17: bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang //
T01D1141:102a-18: bsam gtan bzhi yi rnam pa can //
T01D1141:102a-19: sbyor ba bzhi dang rnam bral ba //
T01D1141:102a-20: bden bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102a-21: phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing //
T01D1141:102a-22: dbang po lnga ni rnam par bsgoms //
T01D1141:102a-23: yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba //
T01D1141:102a-25: dbang drug chu bo la gnas shing //
T01D1141:102a-26: rgyun drug la ni rnam par gnas //
T01D1141:102a-27: pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs //
T01D1141:102a-28: mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102a-29: byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun //
T01D1141:102a-30: 'phags pa'i nor bdun stsol ba po //
T01D1141:102a-31: yan lag bdun dang rnam bral ba //
T01D1141:102a-32: srid bdun gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102a-33: yan lag brgyad las byung ba yi //
T01D1141:102a-34: gang zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing //
T01D1141:102b-0: @102b 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa po //
T01D1141:102b-2: gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing //
T01D1141:102b-3: khong khro dgu ni rnam par spangs //
T01D1141:102b-4: shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa //
T01D1141:102b-5: sa dgu mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102b-7: / sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad //
T01D1141:102b-8: 'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa //
T01D1141:102b-9: stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1141:102b-10: de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir //
T01D1141:102b-11: bstod pas der ni bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang thob pa //
T01D1141:102b-12: des 'dir dmyal dang yi dags dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i //
T01D1141:102b-13: 'gro ba srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ni rgal ba'i
T01D1141:102b-14: rgyur gyur cig / gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa
